input.sentences: it was my nieces 16th birthday so we decided to go into the city to experience what it could offer .
at a little stand we saw the cutest stuffed animals | she just had to have it .
afterwards we went to a factory that produced bubble material .
her she is testing the product | the joy she had that day was just amazing .
once we got home we had one final surprise | a cake with her favorite animated character .
output.sentences: I surprised my nieces with a trip to the factory.
I also gave them the cutest stuffed toy.
When we got to the factory, they were able to see the material the toys they play with everyday were made of.
They had so much fun testing the products.
When we got home, I had one final surprise for them - another toy!
